title: La Liga Fantasy
description: A sports management app where users can build their own teams using real football players. A fun and competitive experience with friends or in public leagues.

milestones.title: Clausulazo
milestones.description: Clausulazo is a feature where you can pay the player to leave the club.

milestones.title: Team stats
milestones.description: Team stats is a feature where you can see the stats of the team.

milestones.title: Internationalization
milestones.description: Internationalization to support the 10 most spoken languages around the world.

milestones.title: Translations Dashboard
milestones.description: Translations Dashboard to manage the translations of the website.
